channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Incorrect Road Closure Sign on Chelt Road, 4th September
item.description:
When approaching Cheltenham Road from Pirton Lane the road closed signs have been incorrectly left out by the overnight team. As a resident the road resurfacing is much appreciated but signage needs to be clear to aid traffic flow, this is only after night #2! (Especially as there are no reported dates for each section closure)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Saltbox, 3rd September
item.description:
Nettles grown around salt box, needs clearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenfall Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over growing tree, 3rd September
item.description:
There is a tree on the grass verge at the junction of Dinglwell and Brookfield road that has a lot of trunk growth protruding into the highway causing vehicles to have to cross the white line and use part of the opposite lane to get past it. This is a busy and blind junction for traffic coming from Brookfield Road. Especially now the children are back to school. Please get this situation sorted before an accident occurs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New markings incorrect, 3rd September
item.description:
From Tommy Taylor’s lane and Cleeve to Cheltenham according to the new road markings you can go ahead in both lanes now. Accident waiting to happen when both lanes try to exit to town centre etc
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues

item.title: Street lights out - Symphony Rd, 3rd September
item.description:
Hi, there’s several street lights out on Symphony Rd - pictured is the one outside number 38/40. At least two others I can see are also affected. It’s been ongoing for several weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Symphony Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light still out after you labelled it fixed, 3rd September
item.description:
You immediately labeled this as fixed it is not, this picture was taken the evening you labelled this as fixed the same day of me reporting it. Selkirk close outside flats 1- 12 are still left in the very dark and feeling unsafe outside their front door. Please fix the street lights they have been out since at least Sunday night

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 3rd September
item.description:

item.title: Flytipping on Malthouse Lane, 3rd September
item.description:
Flytipping on the pavement on Malthouse Lane, outside 47A St Paul's Road. Sofa, cardboard packaging and a refrigeration unit.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Malthouse Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bocked drains, 3rd September
item.description:
The drain on the corner of Suffolk Rd / Bath Rd junction is blocked and after minimal rain the surface water is a hazard for cyclists turning left. The drain surround was recently leveled, but the drain is still blocked. In fact the next drain along is completely overgrown with vegetation too as our many along both sides of Suffolk Rd all the way to the Landown roundabout.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Suffolk Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-12, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
